message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
Alice, $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Let's see if we can find some common ground.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? That's a fair price considering the value this product will bring you.

Alice, I understand your position, but $13,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm happy to pay $12,500. This is a fair price considering my budget and the value of the product to me. Let's try to make this happen.
